name: Game of Life (itch) (cody9443)
description:
PLAY IN FULL SCREEN

Controlls:
Open settings menu: V
Open pattern selection menu: T
Clear board: Left Control.
Remember pattern: Right Alt.
Reset board to remembered pattern: Left Alt.
Start simulation: Space.
Fill cell: Left Mouse Button.
Clear cell: Left Mouse Button.
Scroll: Mouse Scroll Wheel 
Movement: W A S D.
Enable multi-select box: Hold Tab.
Scale selection box: While holding tab, use mouse scroll wheel.
Copy selection: Release Tab.
Paste selection: Right Mouse Button. The Selection Box needs to be the same size as when you copied your selection. You can also adjust the size with the scroll wheel.
